text: Cinnamaldehyde , isolated from an essential oil produced from the leaves of Cinnamomum osmophloeum , was reported to inhibit the secretion of IL - 1β and TNF - α within LPS or lipoteichoic acid ( LTA ) stimulated murine J774A . 1 macrophages . Cinnamaldehyde also suppressed the production of these cytokines from LPS stimulated human blood monocytes derived primary macrophages and human THP - 1 monocytes [ 111 ] .
